text: - Aeroporti di Roma is the company

that manage both for Fiumicino
and Ciampino airport in Rome,
the biggest airports system in Italy,

with more than 49 million
passenger per year (indistinct).

The Innovation Hub is part
of the wider strategy of ADR.
This is a place that we built

inside the Terminal 1
of Fiumicino Airport.

It's where we work together
with our innovation team
and the startups helping us
to shape the airport of the futures.

Every year we accelerate from
10 to 15 startups worldwide,
that working here in our Innovation Hub,

and AWS help us to improve
and developed all the solution
and to improve the customer experience
and process improvement.
- We chose the AWS as a strategic partner
for our accelerator program
because only such a player could deliver
an outstanding performance
in terms of the technology, reliability,
and the security on its cloud environment,
but at the same time,

embracing our innovation and
sustainability key values
that could actually deliver our vision
in terms of airport for the future.

So the work that we are doing
in our accelerator program,

especially focusing on
AI and the robotics,
are defined by two main cases,
which is one with Assaia,
which is working in terms of
machine learning applied to video footage
for the turnaround of planes,
and the Ottonomy,
as an autonomous delivery robot

in terms of getting your
goods directly to the gate.
(upbeat music)
